titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Beaver Island house party [sound recording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [East Lansing, Mich.] : Michigan State University Museum ; Beaver Island Historical Society, p1996.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: When the beavers was Irish (Barry Pischner, Rich Scripps) -- Hail to the beavers (Edward Palmer, Danny Gillespie, Scripps) -- Golden jubilee (Cindy Gillespie Brown, Gillespie) -- I'll be all smiles tonight (Palmer, Scripps) -- Buffalo girls (Palmer, Scripps) -- Raymond (Pischner, Scripps) -- Over the waves (Palmer, Scripps) -- Up jumped the devil (Palmer) -- Enoch Hill (Brown, Gillespie) -- The big Bradley (Pischner, Scripps) -- Rainbow at midnight (Palmer, Scripps) -- Arkansas traveler (Patrick Bonner) -- Gravel walk (Bonner) -- Gallagher boys (Johnny Green) -- Lost on Lake Michigan (Pischner) -- The fatal wedding (Ellen Pischner) -- Mother queen of my heart (Barry Pischner) -- Skibbereen (Mike O'Donnell) -- Jack Haggarty's Flat River girl (Bonner) -- Callahan's reel (Bonner) -- Black and tar on stick/Up and down the broom (Bonner) -- Roll her to the wall (Dominick Gallagher) -- Drowsy Maggie (Bonner) -- Town of St. James (Gillespie, Scripps)

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Recorded in 1938 (tracks 14, 16, 18, 20-23) by Ivan Walton and Alan Lomax, 1952 and 1960 (tracks 12-13, 19) by Ivan Walton, 1990-1994 (tracks 1-11, 15, 17, 24) by Laurie Kay Sommers.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Accompanies: Sommers, Laurie Kay. Beaver Island house party. East Lansing, Mich. : Michigan State University Press, 1996. 86 p. : ill. ; 28 cm.
